    <section class="bg-master-lightest p-b-85 p-t-75">
     <div class="container">
      <div class="md-p-l-20 md-p-r-20 xs-no-padding">
       <p class="block-title hint-text no-margin">
        Chios Hotels in Chios
       </p>
       <div class="row">
        <div class="col-sm-6 col-md-6">
         <h2 class="m-t-5 hidden-xs">
          Welcome to Chios hotels Voulamandis House. Relax and Enjoy...
         </h2>
        </div>
        <div class="col-sm-6 col-md-6 no-padding xs-p-l-15 xs-p-r-15">
         <div class="p-t-20 p-l-35 md-p-l-5 md-p-t-15">
          <p>
           Voulamandis House is located in the region Kampos of Chios island . It is 6km far from the main town of Chios and just 3km from the famous sandy beach of Karfas. Kampos is one of the most beautiful places of Chios. In this area lots of mansions have been heritaged from the past, due to the fact that this area was the colony of the genoese.
          </p>
          <p class="small">
           <a data-target="#modal_desc" data-toggle="modal" href="#">
            Read more...
           </a>
          </p>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </section>
    <!-- END DESCRIPTIONS SECTION -->
    <!-- MODAL DESCRIPTIONS -->
    <div aria-hidden="true" class="modal fade stick-up" id="modal_desc" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog">
      <div class="modal-content-wrapper">
       <div class="modal-content">
        <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
         <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
          <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
          </em>
         </button>
         <h3 class="text-overflow">
          Chios Hotels in Chios
         </h3>
        </div>
        <div class="modal-body">
         <form id="frm_03_add">
          <br/>
          <p>
           <i>
            <b>
             Voulamandis House
            </b>
           </i>
           is located in the region Kampos of
           <b>
            Chios island
           </b>
           . It is 6km far from the main
           <b>
            town of Chios
           </b>
           and just 3km  from the famous sandy beach of Karfas. Kampos is one of the most  beautiful
           <b>
            places of Chios
           </b>
           . In this area lots of mansions have been  heritaged from the past, due to the fact that this area was the colony  of the genoese
          </p>
          <p>
           <b>
            Chios
           </b>
           is the fifth biggest island of Greece, smaller than   Lesvos which is found thirty miles more northern and bigger than the Samos  that is found forty five miles south-eastern. The island recently did  not present developed economy, comparatively with his neighbours, so  much the natural destructions that affected him what the human  differences.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <br/>
          <br/>
          <p>
           <b>
            <i>
             Voulamandis House
            </i>
           </b>
           is situated exactly in  the centre of
           <b>
            Kampos
           </b>
           , in a property of  12.000sqrm covered with orange and  mandarine trees, which are irrigated  from our traditional well, that dominates  in the centre of our huge  courtyard.
          </p>
          <p>
           Once this property belonged to a rich  tradesman of that time and was used as a resting and meditation place.
          </p>
          <p>
           In the beginning the farm was only used  for the production of citrus fruits.
          </p>
          <p>
           After this time the farm became a  property of our family and in parallel with the culture of citrus fruits, we decided to transform the mansion in a  big and convenient  guesthouse. From 1990 we have lodged a lot of visitors from  the entire  world. Our daily contact with people from  Germany, France, Austria,  Belgium,Holland and Sweden had as a result very  good friendships and  many guests decided to visit our house every year and some  of them  twice a year.
          </p>
          <p>
           In Voulamandis House , you can enjoy the  peacefulness and the harmony of the plain, in an ideal environment, where the five senses are excited by the  perfume of flowers and  basilicum, the green of plain, the singing of the birds.
          </p>
          The high palm tree next to the mansion  gives an exotic tone to the  whole environment. If you are attracted by the idea  of staying with  us,participating in the Greek way of living  and being surrounded every  day by the beautiful nature of Kampos – then you  should visit us!
          <br/>
          <br/>
         </form>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <!-- END MODAL DESCRIPTIONS -->

           <div class="p-t-20 p-b-10">
            <div class="p-b-10">
             The Warm decoration combined with the stony walls ensures you for a pleasant and enjoyable stay. The rooms, renovated in 2011, are bright,spacious and airconditioned with big bathrooms, equipped with TV LCD, laptops, free wifi, fridge and kettles to enjoy your coffee or tea in the balcony or in our beatifull garden.

            <div class="swiper-wrapper">
             <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
              <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyBedroomImages1324" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/999a8de2074ac725120125e223e3f722.jpg" title="">
               <span style="display: none;">

           <div class="p-t-20 p-b-10">
            <div class="p-b-10">
             Big airconditioned apartments (45sqrm) are speacially designed for families or group of friends. One separate bedroom, with a living room and fully equipped kitchen. Two balconies with garden view and privacy. Apartments are equipped with TV LCD, laptop with free wifi. You will not miss your house!

The rooms, renovated in 2011, are bright,spacious and airconditioned with big bathrooms, equipped with TV LCD, laptops, free wifi, fridge and kettles to enjoy your coffee or tea in the balcony or in our beatifull garden.

         </div>

        <div class="p-t-10">
         <div class="p-b-10">
          Voulamandis House is a 12.000sqrm with mandarine and organge yard. Between December and January we collect the chian mandarines and sell it to the Chios Fruits factory which is located in Chios Kambos. January until March we collect the oranges and sell it too. The capacity of the farm is 6-7 tones per annum. From the collection of citrus we produce homemade jam and juice which you can taste in our breakfast. Furthermore we produce our own olive oil and wine from our yard. It is really interesting to see and exciting to taste. We  do this is order to preserve the tradition of our ancestors and maintain the farm as possible as it is.
         </div>
         <p>
          • Place:
          <b>
           Outdoor
          </b>
         </p>

         Learn Greek
        </h2>

         <div class="swiper-wrapper">

           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancySpaceImages255" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/60e1f6ecb04b85765fc9beb86bca8e72.jpg" title="">

            </span>

        <div class="p-t-10">
         <div class="p-b-10">
          This program is designed for students who want to make rapid progress in Modern Greek language and deepen their knowledge of Greece and its culture. It offers an intensive language course for beginner, intermediate and advanced level. The course is 40 hours, divided into 10 days, and includes grammar, reading, speaking, and writing. It also provides an insight into Greek culture and civilization. Special courses of Modern Greek Literature and Culture and of Ancient Greek are offered on request. Our Greek teachers are qualified, specialized and experienced in teaching Greek as a foreign language. Moreover the course is combined with lectures, outdoor activities and various tours helping students become more familiar with contemporary Greek culture.
 
 This summer “We Learn Modern Greek” at Chios, Homer’s island. Together we will discover its ancient and medieval history, the Byzantine mosaics of Nea Moni and Genoese castles and mansions. We will discover the aroma of a special resin cal
         </div>

          • Place:
          <b>
           Outdoor
          </b>
         </p>

          • Area:
          <b>
           100.00m
           <sup>
            2
           </sup>
          </b>
         </p>

          </b>

          </b>

        <div class="p-t-10 p-b-10">
         <div class="p-b-10">
          <div id="content-left">
           <div id="map">
           </div>
           <h1>
            Welcome to Chios,  the island of Mastic
           </h1>
           <p>
            Chios is the fifth biggest island in  Greece with 60.000 citizens.  It is located in the only  seven miles away from the Turkish coast (Cesme). Chios island, one of  the most  important products of the island is Mastic, which is uniquely  produced  on it. It is famous and world – widely renowned for its aroma  and  taste.  is cultivated in Mastichochoria, the so called South  part of the Chios Island.
           </p>
           <p>
            During your ,  you are  able to visit clean, sandy and pebbly beaches all around Chios  island.  Famous beaches are Komi, Black Stone Beach, Agia Dynami, Nagos,   Kataraktis and Volissos.  Moreover the island of Chios has unique  places  of Culture, where you are able to visit wonderful monasteries  built in  the ancient times. One of them is the Moundon Monastery and  Nea Moni.  These old Byzantine monasteries used to be one of the most  important  religious centers in Chios during the Turkish occupation. It  was built  in the 11th  century.
           </p>
           <p>
            One of the nicest features of the south part of   is its  medieval villages, which were built during the 14th and the  15th  century. Their typical architecture is characterized by its narrow  paved  streets, leading all to a central square, and by a shelter  central  tower standing in the middle of every village. Pyrgi and Mesta  are  probably the best examples of this construction. The south part of  Chios  island is where the mastic trees are growing and produce the  famous all  over the world mastic gum and oil which is being used  specially in  sweets and alcohol such as ouzo.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
         <p>
          <b>
           Tags
          </b>
          : chios island;chios travel;chios beach;chios town;chios;
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>

      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">

                 <div class="row full-width">

           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyArticleImages193" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/aea3285a77bd8797a3944e6aa7be6fd1.jpg" title="Chios Kambos">
            <span style="display: none;">
             Article Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/aea3285a77bd8797a3944e6aa7be6fd1_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    Chios Kambos
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="mouse-wrapper visible-xs">
          <div class="mouse">
           <div class="mouse-scroll">
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="swiper-navigation swiper-dark-solid swiper-button-prev swiper-button-prev-article2 hidden-xs">
         </div>
         <div class="swiper-navigation swiper-dark-solid swiper-button-next swiper-button-next-article2 hidden-xs">
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-10 p-b-10">
         <div class="p-b-10">
          <p>
           Commencing in 1992 I have been visiting Chios for holidays, the time on Chios since my retirement in early 1995 averaging nearly six months each year. My interests in all aspects of natural history, including a major invertebrate biodiversity study with the help of the Liverpool Museum and by colleagues from other U.K. institutions has given me a broad insight into Chios natural history. I have also undertaken much field investigation with local naturalists, from whom I have also received much help.
          </p>
          <p>
           I would like to thank Iannis Choremi for much help and encouragement in my investigations into Chios natural history and for some of the information on Marine Life, Reptiles, Amphibians and Mammals for this booklet.
          </p>
         </div>
         <p>
          <b>
           Tags
          </b>
          : chios orchids;chiosflowers;chios nature
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-labelledby="article_modal189" class="modal fade slide-right" id="article_modal189" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Chios Orchids
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-article3 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyArticleImages189" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/5a5d19deac492eff2b20b9d153c8b29b.jpg" title="Chios Orchids">
            <span style="display: none;">
             Article Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/5a5d19deac492eff2b20b9d153c8b29b_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">

          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide2" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyArticleImages189" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/5d8c1d55f92fb71826e08b1cbac6b196.jpg" title="Orchids of Chios">
            <span style="display: none;">
             Article Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/5d8c1d55f92fb71826e08b1cbac6b196_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    Orchids of Chios
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide3" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyArticleImages189" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/88ebc55ce3a399aebc282c17ba03ef3e.jpg" title="Chios Orcids">
            <span style="display: none;">
             Article Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/88ebc55ce3a399aebc282c17ba03ef3e_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    Chios Orcids
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="mouse-wrapper visible-xs">
          <div class="mouse">
           <div class="mouse-scroll">
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="swiper-navigation swiper-dark-solid swiper-button-prev swiper-button-prev-article3 hidden-xs">
         </div>
         <div class="swiper-navigation swiper-dark-solid swiper-button-next swiper-button-next-article3 hidden-xs">
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-10 p-b-10">
         <div class="p-b-10">
          <p>
           Visitors can enjoy the wildflowers of  Chios all year round. However, there is an impressive variety of flowers  from late winter until early summer.
          </p>
          <p>
           Autumn and winter landscapes are flooded  with cyclamens, crocus, lilies and other wildflower species. At the end  of winter, flowers that belong to the orchids’ series Himantoglossum  robertianum appear at various sites all over the island.
          </p>
          <p>
           Agricultural practices in Chios are  various and non-intensive, enabling thus the creation of sites of  botanical interest and variety. Early in the season the visitor will  discover different flowers at sites that are close to one another. There  are different types of anemones, wild tulips (which the locals call  “lalades”), poppies, bushes, sparti, irises and many other species.  Aromatic herbs, such as sage and oregano are also in blossom at the  time.
          </p>
          <p>
           There are several beautiful sites at Chios where you can admire the variety of wildflowers.
          </p>
          <p>
           Kato Fana at the south of Chios is a  sandy beach, at the back of which sand hills have been formed. Orchids  grow there during April and May.
          </p>
          <p>
           Managros at the north – west of Chios is a three kilometer sand and  pebble beach. Spring wild flowers are found there from late March to mid  April.
          </p>
          <p>
           Pelinaio Mountain has been the focus of  botanical research. There are some unique species that only grow on the  mountain, such as a type of dwarf cherry (Prunus prostratum) and  Fritillaria pelinea.
          </p>
          <p>
           The Kampia ravine at the north of Chios  with a length of two miles is a treasure of flowers. The best time for a  walk there is in May. You can enjoy the shadow from the thick  vegetation, the walk by the river, oak trees and wild roses growing by  its side.
          </p>
          <p>
           The low hills in central and south  Chios, near the villages of Pyrgi, Olympoi and Mesta are rich in a flora  species called maquis. Some rare orchids can be found there.
          </p>
          <p>
           The significant number of orchids that  have been discovered in Chios is an example of the island’s rich flora.  In 2002 and 2003 five new species have been added. A lot of botanists  have done research on the orchids of Chios and as a result Chios has  received worldwide attention as one of the richest places of Europe in  orchids.
          </p>
          <h1>
           chios.gr
           <br/>
          </h1>
         </div>
         <p>
          <b>
           Tags
          </b>
          : chios orchids
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>

        </h2>
       </div>

             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/ad49c483e8258d50a809f261ac736891_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">

        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          <strong style='color: rgb(88, 50, 30); font-family: Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif; font-size: 11px; text-align: justify;'>
           Voulamandis House
          </strong>
          <span style='color: rgb(88, 50, 30); font-family: Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif; font-size: 11px; text-align: justify;'>
           is located in the region Kampos of Chios island . It is 6km far from the main town of Chios and just 3km from the famous sandy beach of Karfas. Kampos is one of the most beautiful places of Chios. In this area lots of mansions have been heritaged from the past, due to the fact that this area was the colony of the genoese
          </span>
          <strong style='color: rgb(88, 50, 30); font-family: Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif; font-size: 11px; text-align: justify;'>
           .
          </strong>
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>

    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal855" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal855" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Lagada
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi1 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages855" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/75033cc7af8e438bf0c98699fcdd8d4c.jpg" title="chios island">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/75033cc7af8e438bf0c98699fcdd8d4c_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    chios island
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         The picturesque Lagada harbour attracts many visitors during the summer. At the taverns, you can enjoy fresh fish and sea food, accompanied by ouzo. It is popular for having your lunch, dinner but also there are many caffe bar where you can enjoy your drink too. One of the high lights of the island for memorial photos and selfies with a ouzo bottel on the background.
         <p>
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.477773240387,26.124023205074/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>

    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal894" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal894" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Chios Citrus Juice
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi2 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages894" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/4d9260cb61522e88ce56c44c5244f852.jpg" title="chios juice">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/4d9260cb61522e88ce56c44c5244f852_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    chios juice
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          <span style="color: rgb(97, 97, 97); font-family: PFBagueSansPro, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: center;">
           Fruit juice straight from nature, nothing more, nothing less. We handpick the best fruit in season, full of juice and aroma. We squeeze the fruit, extract the juice, pasteurize and immediately store the juice in our refrigerator inside high-technology, aseptic aluminum bags. These same bags are the fillers for consumer juice cartons. So what you get is pure fruit juice.
          </span>
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.370109362852,26.137289410861/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>

Usually greek music is available Friday and Saturday.Please check with us to confirm a reservation with them. Enjoy!

        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         Vegera is a very nice spot in Megas Limnionas, where our guests can enjoy their drink or coffee all day long. Also it serves cold dishes . Different type of salads , spaghetti and much more. It is not a traditional taverna or restaurant. It has also a small children playground, usefull for parents that would like to relax and enjoy Aegean Sea view

        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Komi
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi9 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages805" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/65aa6bda227a8a4064c54c29f5084c1d.jpg" title="Chios Komi">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/65aa6bda227a8a4064c54c29f5084c1d_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    Chios Komi
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          Komi is located south East as you can notice from the map. It is a big sandy beach with umbrellas and  beach beds. There are beach bars in the area that could serve you a cold drink or a coffee. Usually Saturday and Sunday is crowded but you can still find a quite spot to enjoy its wonderful green coloured waters. Komi supposed to be one of the most well known beaches of Chios.
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.201277330377,26.041244870456/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal806" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal806" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Black Stone
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi10 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages806" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/48a9dfb4620729dac1506fee8c1a1bfc.jpg" title="Chios Black Stone Beach">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/48a9dfb4620729dac1506fee8c1a1bfc_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    Chios Black Stone Beach
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          Black Stone beach is the beach that any guests that visits Chios shouldn't miss. You probably have read already many things about it. Was created by a volcano thus the stones are black. Once you arrive in the beach you will notice that there is not only one beach. Walk 4-5 minutes and you will see more places for swimming. Wind sensitive beach. Get our advice before you travel there. In the harbor of Black stone beach you may find nice tavernas too. Start early from hotel to spend a wonderful day combining the surrounding villages (pyrgi, mesta, olympoi, elata). No beach beds not umbrellas.
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.185205724375,26.028370267185/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal807" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal807" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Pyrgi
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi11 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages807" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/e49106579323b194723c3dfb0be286e1.jpg" title="">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/e49106579323b194723c3dfb0be286e1_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          The entire village of Pyrgi - 25 Km south of the town of Chios - is one  of the areas which still stands as it was built. The narrow roads, the  innumerable churches, and amongst them the 13th century Byzantine church  of St. Apostles in combination with the unique black and white  geometrical decor of the outer walls of the houses. -The "xysta" -are  the things which enchant the visitor.
         </p>
         <p>
         </p>
         <p>
          At the center of Pyrgi rises the defense tower, where the inhabitants 
 took refuge in the case of attack, using a movable bridge. The streets 
 are narrow , stone-paved, and are connected to the central tower square.
  At frequent intervals there are transverse archways supporting the 
 structures, as well as vaults and arches supporting the rooms. The 
 functional character of the houses was geared to defense, and thus the 
 inhabitants were able to move about the roofs without being seen. The 
 four-sided shape of these houses, their thick structure, the defense 
 system, the small areas for general use, and their relation to the 
 treeless, natural surroundings, convince us that Pyrgi was built on a 
 fixed plan which may have been imposed by the Genoese.
         </p>
         <p>
          source: chiosonline.gr
          <br/>
         </p>
         <p>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.227198598245,25.999236112865/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal808" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal808" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Vroulidia
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi12 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages808" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/5ef797844549c1e5a427bb99a07a89d6.jpg" title="Chios Vroulidia">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/5ef797844549c1e5a427bb99a07a89d6_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    Chios Vroulidia
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          <span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">
           The
  beautiful and picturesque beach Vroulidia located 11 km south around 
 the tower. It is very small, around 100 meters long and is accessible on
  foot after leaving the car a few meters up, in a parking lot there. The
  organization is a vestigial canteen parked in the space above the 
 beach, so you should go equipped with the necessary supplies for you and
  umbrellas. It usually 100% protected by all short of types of North Wind (East, West) but not from South Wind. Get our advise before you go there after your breakfast. We recommended it !!
           <br/>
          </span>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.157017044575,26.008629208835/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal809" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal809" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Salagonas
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi13 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages809" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/e054f31bfeaaacd37a49dfa07e46fd53.jpg" title="Chios Salagonas Beach">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/e054f31bfeaaacd37a49dfa07e46fd53_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    Chios Salagonas Beach
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          Are you reading this text ? Well stop now and GO THERE!. The beauty of Nature's simplicity. Just everything is the right place with the right color. We love this beach , we recommend this beach. Half Organised. You may find a Katine. Umbrellas and beach beds. The street at the last 2 km is not asphalt but ground street. If you are with the motorbike you better go slowly. for the ones with the cars you will get a bit dusty. But with your arrival there, you will get your reward ! enjoy ...
          <br/>
         </p>
         <p>
          <br/>
         </p>

          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>

        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         The Twins
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi14 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages810" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/82878f261ce8023a2ff0364dee08fabc.jpg" title="didimes Chios">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/82878f261ce8023a2ff0364dee08fabc_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>

             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">

                    didimes Chios
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          Nice and and quite beach for people that would like privacy. Saturdays and Sundays probably might be more bussy. Small pebbles and Sand. Not organised. Very close to harbor of Mesta. You can combined swimming and lunch very easily. We recommend it . Watch out the wind. We need to instruct you about the weather conditions before you travel there. Wind sensitive beach. Not organised but you will find natural shadows from the trees in the beach. Rush to get a spot...you better start
          <br/>
         </p>

        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Agia Dynami
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi17 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages813" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/a540c8a2a74a42b3f087fb2bf76ca2de.jpg" title="Agia Dynami Chios">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/a540c8a2a74a42b3f087fb2bf76ca2de_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    Agia Dynami Chios
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          Agia Dynami is one of the most beautiful beaches of the island. Located 
 36 km south-west of the town of Chios and 7 miles south of Olympi 
 village. It got the name from the monastery, Agia Dynami (St. Power), 
 which dominates the hill on the south side of the bay. It differs from 
 the other beaches of the island due to its turquoise waters and white 
 sand. There is no organization that is why you need to have the 
 necessary supplies for you. To get there you need before to arrive in Olympoi villafa turn to direction of cave to Olympoi. The street is asphalt and easy to drive. No tavernaw around the area. Anything you might need you need to get it before you arrive. There are many trees in the beach to provide you shadow. The small monastery beside the beach can be used as a seating area
          <br/>
         </p>
         <p>
          explorechios.gr
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.213214905034,25.910953885349/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal814" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal814" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         My Market
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi18 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages814" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/79b3ea26442a18d212559d2f2b123640.jpg" title="Chios market">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/79b3ea26442a18d212559d2f2b123640_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    Chios market
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          Big Syper market very close to our hotel. Guests can get all there necessary supplies very easily. It usually open all weekday and Saturday until 8 o'oclock in the afternoon apart from Saturday that closes earlier around 6pm. Beside the supermarket there is a Bank Atm
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.337094740791,26.140336400302/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>

         Bourtzi
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi19 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages815" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/f5a41b706ad73f12e539891f07f552fc.jpg" title="Chios bourtzi">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>

             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/f5a41b706ad73f12e539891f07f552fc_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">

         <p>
          Bourtzi is a nice bar exactly at the end of Chios harbor. Very quite and chill out place. You enjoy all variety of drinks and cocktails having the whole view of chios harbor. Around 10 o'oclock in the night , the boat arrives and passes exactly beside you . Nice and exciting experience , switch on your phone camera and take the selfie that will become viral .....enjoy and relax

        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Pantoukios
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi24 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages820" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/70fa90f58c44f8f495b7985918db1d36.jpg" title="Chios pantoukios">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/70fa90f58c44f8f495b7985918db1d36_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">

             <div class="inner full-height">

                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    Chios pantoukios
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         Fish taverna , in a very quiet area with really traditional fish dishes. The sea is beside the tavernas tables . It is recommend for lunch and dinner too. It is a very peaceful area compared to the Lagada area which is more popular. We recommend it.
         <p>
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.463289698084,26.135340786012/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">

    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal821" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal821" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Nea Moni
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi25 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages821" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/262e982818ccea3b09cce4d8c63c875d.jpg" title="Nea Moni Chios">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/262e982818ccea3b09cce4d8c63c875d_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    Nea Moni Chios
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         The monastery was built in the mid-11th century, by Byzantine emperor Constantine IX Monomachos and his wife, Empress Zoe. According to tradition, it is built on the location where three monks, Nikitas, Ioannes and Iosif, miraculously found an icon of the Virgin Mary, hanging from a branch of myrtle.[2] At that time, Constantine was exiled in nearby Lesbos, and the monks visited him and told of a vision according to which he would eventually become emperor. Constantine promised to build a church if this should come to pass. Indeed, in 1042, Constantine became emperor, and in gratitude began constructing the monastery, dedicated to the Theotokos.[2] The main church (the katholikon) was inaugurated in 1049, and the complex finished in 1055, after Constantine's death.[3]
         <p>
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.374090040282,26.056707805427/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal822" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal822" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Avgonima
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi26 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages822" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/9828f26c04ad4c22823263b3651dd23f.jpg" title="Avgonima Chios">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/9828f26c04ad4c22823263b3651dd23f_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    Avgonima Chios
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         This is a village in central Chios, at 16 Km from Hora (capital), on the west side of the island, and at about 6 Km from Anavatos. The name of the village, according to Konstantinos Amantos (literary figure), derives from the local name “Avgonimata” (an area between Avgonima and Anavatos), which - in Greek - means “low - value fields”. The village is very old, probably pre-mediaeval. Jeronimo Ioustiniani has referred to the village as a fortress, which, according to legend, was devastated by pirates. Elinta (or otherwise Alinta, Alous, Alounta or Eleounta) is a sheltered bay on the west of the village - Archaeo - logical excavations on the area have revealed finds dating from the Romans. The scarcity of fresh water - a great problem for the local people - has been commemoreted in a verse, written by some unknown visitor to the area in the past, which is still said nowadays: “Avgonima is a nice village - with a disadvantage, though. By the time you pour the water, the pot has burnt!”
         <p>
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.377570062211,26.021718388828/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal823" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal823" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Anavatos
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi27 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages823" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/44cd5d7d39ea3659a1b8b4b46d345f7d.jpg" title="Chios Anavatos">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/44cd5d7d39ea3659a1b8b4b46d345f7d_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    Chios Anavatos
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          Although it is a deserted village, it has still preserved its history, which is often sensed by the visitor when wandering through its stone-paved streets. The town has often been associated with the Greek War of Independence in 1821 and the massacres of 1822, who represent an important part in history of the island.
         </p>
         <p>
         </p>
         <p>
          The village of Anavatos got its name originally from the Greek word "anaveno", which means "I climb". For such a difficult to reach village perched on top of a cliff, this name definitely fits. The village is built on a rocky elevation with steep sides and sheer cliffs on the South and West, so that it can only be approached from the North. This natural defenses make it probable that the village was originally founded in this site for security reasons to control the west cast during the period of piracy.
          <br/>
         </p>
         <p>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.402125215845,26.020688420566/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal824" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal824" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Elinda
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi28 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages824" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/4cf6e17a521d2feaf85a892a173baa90.jpg" title="Elina chios">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/4cf6e17a521d2feaf85a892a173baa90_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    Elina chios
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          On the west of Chios you will find some of Chios most unique, secluded, and virgin beaches. Elida bay is one that stands out, and for good reason too. A magical location, a big closed bay, quiet and sheltered from winds, that lies 25 kilometres from town and five kilometres form Anavatos and Lithi respectively.
          <br/>
          The rare beauty of the surrounding nature is stunning. Mountains surround the bay and the pine trees reach up to the seaside. The green blue cool waters and the all white pebbles of the beach offer a unique experience that no visitor should miss. The beach has no umbrellas or a cantine to serve drinks. It is an amazing beach for people that like to enjoy nature beauties.
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.391471657791,25.991377240451/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal825" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal825" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Nagos
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi29 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages825" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/1afb916d6247f16a537ce909479fd6c9.jpg" title="nagos chios">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/1afb916d6247f16a537ce909479fd6c9_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>

            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">

                    nagos chios

                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         Nagos beach is a small bay, with small dark pebbles and crystal clear waters. On top of the hill a small church offers a picturesque touch to the scenery. Around the beach there are several taverns that work during the summer, offering selections of local cuisine and fresh fish.  Nagos is one of the most beautiful beaches in Chios. North east wind sensitive
         <p>
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.560045463948,26.082808381351/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">

        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Agios Isidoros
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi40 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages836" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/a4738f3f1a08f69bfc172ac4892f0ce9.jpeg" title="">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/a4738f3f1a08f69bfc172ac4892f0ce9_thumb.jpeg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          <br/>
         </p>
         <p>
          In North Chios and shortly after Sykiada village lies the picturesque
  chapel of Agios Isidoros (St. Isidore). It is a bay with beach with 
 fine pebbles which leads to the chapel.
         </p>
         <p>
          It is one of the most photographed places on the island. Behind the 
 church there is a bench with seating where you can rest and enjoy the 
 view.
         </p>
         <p>
          There you will not be able to find anything else. Just the Church and the beautifull scenery.
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.470373284438,26.142707473071/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal837" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal837" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Petros Pita Souvlaki
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi41 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages837" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/f801032bf9de5c7125ae2fb4a9093d2d.jpg" title="petros souvlaki chios">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/f801032bf9de5c7125ae2fb4a9093d2d_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    petros souvlaki chios
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          Petros is one one of the eldest and traditional Pita Souvlaki food stores of Chios. It counts more than 50 years. There you can taste among other shops of course the Greek pita giros and souvlaki. It is open morning hours and then afternoon and late evening. The shop stops around 12-12:30 am every day usually during Summer days and until 11:00 pm the rest days of the year. I am sure you will enjoy it. It is only take away store
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.371699136679,26.135368949207/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>

     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>

        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          Marinos Korakis it is a souvenir stores with many traditional Chios products and liquers. They have their own homemade "spoon sweets" as we call it in Greece. In case you like to buy some small gifts for Friends it is recommended.
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.370471060495,26.137104338439/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>

    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal839" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal839" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">

        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          Dimitris owns a small traditional store that sells Chios traditional products. Diferrent types of Cheese , liquers, honey, olives  and much more plenty variety of products. It is nice to visit. It is recommended.
