        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Lefkathia
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi44 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages840" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/6b598a6742a4ddce2c03e3762a483f30.jpg" title="lefkathia chios">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/6b598a6742a4ddce2c03e3762a483f30_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>

            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    lefkathia chios
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          Lefkathia is a very nice and quite beach special during weekdays (July and August is becoming more crowded), with small pebbles, easy to walk on it, deep clean waters and probably fresh during the most Summer Season. Defently we recommended to our guests. It is sensitive to south wind (waves). around the area you can find umbrellas , beach beds, a nice beach bar and taverna. Enjoy!
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.471490466077,25.915079122814/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>

    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal841" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal841" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">

         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">

        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Archaeological
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi45 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages841" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/776a06c303d8e9b4fd6924c981ba5cf2.jpg" title="museum chios">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/776a06c303d8e9b4fd6924c981ba5cf2_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    museum chios
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          The secondary exhibition of the Archaeological Museum of Chios is  located on the third floor and is entitled "Psara in Antiquity" It  includes the findings of the Mycenaean cemetery of Psara (Archontiki  area). It also includes decorated pottery, luxurious beads, gold  jewelry, faience and glass paste, figurines shaped Φ and many offerings .
         </p>
         <p>
          The exhibits come from excavations of the Greek Archaeological Agency  in private and public land, from excavations of the British School of  Archaeology in Emporios, in Fana area, in Agio Galas, in Dotia and  Kofinas, from the excavations of the Archaeological Society at Rizari  and Fana areas, from work of Greek editor Stefanou and from individual  donations.
         </p>
         <p>
          Entrance fee: 2€, Phone number: +30 22710 44239, 44560, 44650,Visiting Hours: Tuesday to Sunday 8:00 to 15:00
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.364959181103,26.139589405092/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal842" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal842" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Panagia Krina
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi46 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages842" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/63605316a868d6ea094e787be2dd9574.jpg" title="panagia krina chios">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/63605316a868d6ea094e787be2dd9574_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    panagia krina chios
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          Panagia Krina is a church dedicated to Virgin Mary and is located at central Chios, near Vavyli village.
          <br/>
          It was built in the 12th century while a part was added in 18th century.
          <br/>
          The church was built by and belonged to two members of the imperial court of Constantinople: Efstathios Kodratos and Eirini Doukaina Pagomeni.
          <br/>
          Panagia Krina architecture is that of the octagonal type and resembles the main church (katholicon) of Nea Moni. The great dome is one of the characteristic features of this church.
          <br/>
          Most of the interior walls are covered with paintings, the oldest of which are dated to the 13th century. These were not discovered until lately, when parts of newer paintings were detached from the walls.
          <br/>
          During the winter time restoration work is being done on the wall paintings. The monument is only open for the public during the summer.
          <br/>
          <br/>
          chioslife.gr
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.316187796762,26.081671124729/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal843" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal843" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Byzantine
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi47 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages843" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/ec75ebcf97ed08f5a8e28091d9f6f12e.jpg" title="Byzantine museum chios">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/ec75ebcf97ed08f5a8e28091d9f6f12e_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    Byzantine museum chios
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         Byzantine Museum of Chios was created in 1980 and is located close to the main city square (Vounaki square).
         <br/>
         Even the building of the museum is of great interest. It is a former Ottoman mosque, called Mecidiye mosque and was built in the 19th century by sultan Abdul Mecid. The mosque as a monument and the exhibition of the museum coexit and compliment each other.
         <br/>
         There are early Christian and Byzantine sculptures exposed at the museum yard but also from the Genoese and Ottoman period. There are also Jewish tombstones and canons of the 17th century, made ​​of iron and brass.
         <br/>
         At the main exhibition room of the museum, the visitor can find inscriptions, pottery and folk art, miniature, wood carvings and sculptures of the early Christian, Byzantine, Genoese period. There are detached Byzantine and post-Byzantine frescoes, too.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         info: www.chioslife.gr
         <p>
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.370688183358,26.135820230873/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal844" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal844" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Agia fotia
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi48 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages844" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/9f4cdb580e9a00af5b4e194e83a287c7.jpg" title="Agia Fotia Beach">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/9f4cdb580e9a00af5b4e194e83a287c7_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    Agia Fotia Beach
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          Agia Fotia is a close to Voulamandis House and close to Chios town beach. It is a place that is very common for the locals to have their swim . There you can find umbrellas, beach beds , cafe bars and tavernas. You can combine your swim and lunch. Recommend for the ones that have limited time and would like a short trip or for the ones that have overslept and is already too late ;-))
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.285734012123,26.120453184875/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal845" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal845" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>

        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Hondos Center
        </h2>

        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         Building on the company's experience in housing the largest variety of branded cosmetics &amp; fashion merchandise, Hondos Center aims at offering to its client base an one – stop shopping destination for the most prestigious brands in:

        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Vodafone
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi50 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages846" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/bac9f4186b471f87026632461c0cd3c1.jpg" title="Vodafone chios">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">

You can easily spend half a day there. Eat , drink and enjoy. surely coming to an island going to the beach is the most sensible thing to do but we do recommend Bloom as an alternative

        </h2>

                   </p>

               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         Daskalopetra harbor is a traditional fishing harbor of Vrontados Area. It is really nice and relaxing to visit it during afternoon and night. Daskolpetra in Greek means the stone of teacher (Homirus). There you can find a small taverna with nice mezedes that we do recommend to our visitors.
         <p>
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.419241614967,26.134076124462/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>

    </div>

      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">

         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Karavela
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi57 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages853" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/6d5c3c487227a2bb5888d6a23a1d2d3b.jpg" title="Chios karavela">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/6d5c3c487227a2bb5888d6a23a1d2d3b_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    Chios karavela
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          if you are looking for an organized beach, Komi is one of the good choices. Karavela has tables by the beach. You may use the sunbeds free of charge.  However, it won't be a false choice to spend the day and enjoy the sea at Karavela. We recommend to our guests to visit Karavela and combine a swim to the beautiful beach of Komi. It a nice choice for families too, since parents can enjoy their lunch while their chilldren are playing with the sand of Komi beach !! Good idea  ;-)))
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.201639870294,26.043905621799/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal854" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal854" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Limnia
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi58 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages854" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/2454b991c11bedfc57385b1795e93438.jpg" title="Chios limnia">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/2454b991c11bedfc57385b1795e93438_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    Chios limnia
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         Limnia is the harbor of Volissos Village. It is a small traditional fishing harbor, where guests can visit and enjoy their coffee, tea, fresh drink , lunch or dinner. In the area you will find different kind of facilitites that can cover your needs, since you are far from Chios town. Before Limnia is a beatifull big beach Magemena , Managros and Lefkathia and Limnos. Within a distance of couple of hundreds of metters you can explore the area. Usually from this harbor once a week (summer season) you can travel from Limnia to Psara Island. If you have time do it! It worths! You better contact us to find out the boat trips.  Do not forget . Volissos Village  is famous more its tasty hand made Bread. Give it a try !
         <p>
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>

         <p>
          The MindTrap is the largest live escape game in Europe. In September 
 2014 it set the bar of alternative and interactive amusement high. As of
  today, and having created 12 branches already, it remains as the 
 largest space of interactive and real-life experiences in Greece, 
 opening up abroad as well.
         </p>
         <p>
          More than 40 escape game rooms, with a wide range of 
 themes, in which a group of 2-6 is being locked and lives the scenario 
 of their favorite movies trying to solve riddles and mysteries that keep
  them locked inside.
         </p>
         <p>
          At the MindTrap we offer the best entertainment 
 experience that is around at the moment. Many of our rooms are hiding 
 surprises, as professional actors are locked inside as well, creating 
 breathtaking scenery and uplifting the whole real-life experience! Will 
 you manage to escape on time?
         </p>

         <p>
          Beatifull sandy beach in the west side of the island. There is also a local fishermen's shelter there. Lithi is known for its fishermen and the local taverns by the beach that offer a big variety of fresh fish and local delicacies. The seaside with golden thin sand is ideal for games.
          <br/>
          After your swim you can take a walk at the waterfront pedestrian road that leads to the cafes and taverns. The sunset there is also an experience that must not be missed. It is organised with umbrellas and beach beds. Surely Recommend it !!
          <br/>

         It is indeed creative cuisine, but not too creative to lose the traditional style.
         <br/>
         The portions are large, so the price is definitely worth it.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We had among others: rooster with mastic-scented pasta, burger a la creme with roquefort &amp; mastic sauce, pork pancettas with chocolate sauce, carbonara (amethystos) and veggie pasta (vesuvius) and all were excellent.
         <br/>

         The desserts are also strongly recommended, especially the orange pie with a ball of mastic icecream.

       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">

         </div>

        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          Suppose to be one of the well known tavernas down town. Exactly in the center of main Chios port.  You will be able to enjoy the traffic of Chios town. Is the most popular place for local citizens to spend their Saturday night.It is a nice taverna in Chios center.
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.369930616256,26.137837922605/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">

    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal869" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal869" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Chios Mastic
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi72 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages869" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/33224b7229ae447448c3f88ceb1ae5c5.jpg" title="Chios mastic museum">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/33224b7229ae447448c3f88ceb1ae5c5_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    Chios mastic museum
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         The Chios Mastic Museum aims to showcase the production history of the mastic tree’s cultivation and the processing of its resin, which it integrates into the cultural landscape of Chios. Through the prism of UNESCO’s inclusion of traditional mastic cultivation on its Representative List of the Intangible Cultural Heritage of Humanity in 2014, emphasis is given to the diachronicity and sustainability of this product of Chios.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         What is on display:
         <br/>
         The permanent exhibition centres on Chios mastíha as a unique natural product. The introductory module provides information on the mastic tree and mastíha, its resin, which in 2015 was recognised as a natural medicine. The first module presents the traditional know-how of mastic cultivation. The second module focuses on how managing the cultivation and its produce shaped the agricultural landscape and the settlements of southern Chios and the Mastichochoria historically. The third module is dedicated to mastíha resin’s cooperative exploitation
         <p>
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.215507774316,26.014830476077/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal870" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal870" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Kallimasia Folklore
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi73 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages870" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/4a975dfccb9038a9c57954f66dc2fe75.jpg" title="Chios kalimassia">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/4a975dfccb9038a9c57954f66dc2fe75_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    Chios kalimassia
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         The collection of folklore material and artefacts started in 1995, by the Association “Friends of the Kallimasia Folklore Museum” and it’s President, Yiannis Kolliaros. The idea was to use the 550 sq.m. underground room of the Kallimasia High School in order to house the Museum. The visitor can now see areas that have been transformed in places of traditional professions and activities, such as a traditional village house, a traditional groceries store, an olive oil press and an ouzo distillery. There is also an area dedicated to Karagkiozis, the traditional greek shadow theatre. All artefacts have been donated by people of the villages and Chios town.
         <p>
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.292361345371,26.105183368953/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal871" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal871" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">

        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Chios Maritime
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi74 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages871" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/06ff3691ca14219694e62a5a6916deef.jpg" title="Chios marine museum">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/06ff3691ca14219694e62a5a6916deef_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    Chios marine museum
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         The Chios Maritime Museum is the realisation of its founders – all members of important shipping families that have created the Chiot nautical miracle - old dream: to create an important house – museum for the Modern Greek maritime industry. The Chios Maritime Museum is housed in a traditional mansion of the town centre, property of the late Anastasios and Marouko Patera. Their heirs donated the house to the Foundation of Anastasios and Marouko Patera.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         The Chios Maritime Museum is the only cultural organisation in Chios dedicated to the island's maritime history. The people of Chios have a long contribution to maritime and commerce. The Museum’s basic aim is to present in the best way, this very important part of this island's life. It does so through the collection of objects and data connected to Chios maritime tradition, as well as to the evolution of maritime and commercial shipping in general. The museum also organises events and activities such as speeches and conferences with s
         <p>
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.367030653917,26.13394469622/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal872" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal872" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Koraes Central Public and Historical Library
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi75 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages872" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/9440e0092fed283b8e40a925eff6482a.jpg" title="chips korais">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/9440e0092fed283b8e40a925eff6482a_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    chips korais
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         The Argenti Folklore Museum and the Argenti Gallery at Koraes Central Public and Historical Library are basically the personal collections of Philip Pandely Argenti.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         In 1932, Philip Argenti founded the “Argenti Association” in order to save and preserve folklore and historical material of Chios, through collections of historical artefacts, folklore costumes etc.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         The “Ethnologic Museum” opened its doors in 1937, in a room of the Chios High School. Philip Argenti has enriched the collections since, via donations and new acquisitions. Thus, the founder of the Folklore Museum decided to expand the Library's building, adding a second storey, in order to house the Folklore collection, as well as the collection of Chios paintings he had donated.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         In 1962 the new rooms were opened. After Philip Argenti's passing in 1974, his son, Pandely Philip Argenti donated more books and paintings to the museum. All the paintings that decorate the entrance of the Library, the stairs and the hallway depic
         <p>
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.367897079783,26.13666713837/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal873" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal873" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>

         <p>
          Glaroi beach is a nice beach right after Daskalopetra (Vrontados). Very small bay , with clean and fresh waters. Thre you can find a beach bar and umbrellas. Noisy for the ones that would like to relax and sleep in the beach. The best beach for the younsters that would like to enjoy sun and cold drinks  ;-)))) it is up to you for the final decision.

           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages875" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/163695f2342033c4cffb7250c3ec91e8.jpg" title="chips apothika">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/163695f2342033c4cffb7250c3ec91e8_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">

                </div>

            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>

        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          Apothika beach is a beach with nice surprises. With your first arrival you will be think "Why voulamandis house recommends this beach?". just be patient and explore. Walk along the beach on the right. At the end of the beach , pull up the trousers walk in the sea ......and then you will understand why we recommend it. Numerous private caves ....
          <br/>
         </p>

        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Tigani
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi79 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages876" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/fbb74936f1732f33997c3a540bc965fb.jpg" title="Chios tigani">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/fbb74936f1732f33997c3a540bc965fb_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    Chios tigani
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         Another hidden treasure of the west coastline, Tigani beach lies in an 
 area of 1800 square metres and is about two kilometres from Sidirounta 
 village. It is usually favoured for seawater activities, such as fishing
  and snorkelling, as the underwater landscape is very interesting.
         <br/>
         The
  surrounding scenery and greenery is also very interesting. Also if you 
 stay until late, you will have the opportunity to enjoy one of the most 
 magical sunsets on the island, with a view of Psara Island.
         <p>
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.404359573147,25.966092056068/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal877" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal877" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Olympi Cave
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi80 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages877" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/6465eb1c63576e1fde6bfacf4f22a59e.jpg" title="Chios olympoi cave">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/6465eb1c63576e1fde6bfacf4f22a59e_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    Chios olympoi cave
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          The cave of Olympi (also known as cave Sykia) is located on the South
  part of Chios island, near Olympi village and not far away from
          <a href="http://www.chioslife.gr/en/villages/pyrgi">
           Pyrgi
          </a>
          and
          <a href="http://www.chioslife.gr/en/villages/mesta">
           Mesta
          </a>
          villages. It was explored in 1985 by the Hellenic Speleological Society and it is open for public since 2003.
         </p>
         <p>
          It is located 100 meters above sea level and its maximum depth is 55 
 meters. Although the cave is relatively small, its interior full of 
 stalactites and stalagmites is exceptional, making it one of the best of
  its kind in Greece.
         </p>
         <p>
          <br/>
         </p>
         <p>
          www.chioslife.gr
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.212142205177,25.926105684074/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>

     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Inspot Chios
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi81 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages878" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/70d9c9b443f41cb1e5c70ad4bc4e7c19.jpg" title="chips inspot">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/70d9c9b443f41cb1e5c70ad4bc4e7c19_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    chips inspot
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          Inspot is an internet cafe in CHios town

        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Armolia
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi84 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages881" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/acb9abd84f80e6e4bd42c29d4c75b7e5.jpg" title="Armolia chios">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/acb9abd84f80e6e4bd42c29d4c75b7e5_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    Armolia chios
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          The people of Armolia maintain a long tradition in ceramic pottery such  as pitchers, vases, jars, bowls, cups, etc. In the village, there are  small, stone houses, narrow side streets and cobbled roads. On the hill, west of the village, stands the Byzantine castle of 
 Apolichna, which was built in 1446. The Genoese established the 
 administrative mansion of the Mastichochoria (Mastic villages) there.
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.254138496287,26.031631833347/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal882" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal882" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Volissos
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi85 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages882" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/610a8e6afcaf0f6b3a28e9059fac6565.jpg" title="VOLISSOS">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/610a8e6afcaf0f6b3a28e9059fac6565_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                    VOLISSOS
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          The traditional village of Volissos is built on the side of a tall and 
 steep hill, at the top of which stands a medieval castle. The Castle was
  built during the Byzantine period and according to tradition it is 
 considered a project of General Velissarios (6th century), however based
  on research is most possible that its construction dates back to the 
 11th century during a period of general reorganisation of the island. In
  the mid-15th century the Castle was restored by the Genoese.
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.48400507716,25.92412889603/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-labelledby="poiLocationModal883" class="modal fade slide-right" id="poiLocationModal883" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>

           Fruit juice straight from nature, nothing more, nothing less. We handpick the best fruit in season, full of juice and aroma. We squeeze the fruit, extract the juice, pasteurize and immediately store the juice in our refrigerator inside high-technology, aseptic aluminum bags. These same bags are the fillers for consumer juice cartons. So what you get is pure fruit juice.

          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>

     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Chios Beer
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-pagepoi104 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyPoiImages902" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/7a660ec133390effad6a75219522cb04.jpg" title="">
            <span style="display: none;">
             POI Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/7a660ec133390effad6a75219522cb04_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-left m-r-10">
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-20 p-b-20">
         <p>
          In a brown bottle of 330ml, the beer from Chios came in order to 
 complete the fine selection that microbreweries offer to our country in 
 recent years. By opening the bottle and servicing the beer in the glass 
 it immediately offers its blurry blond color, which means that it hasn’t
  been filtered. The white foam with blond highlights has moderate 
 density and duration. In the glass you will see just a few small bubbles
  from carbonate.
         </p>
         <p>
          The hop and citrus aromas are dominant. The slight bitterness, which 
 is by no means unpleasant to the consumer, supplemented by flowerness 
 that carries you in a spring valley as the one in Chios where its 
 producing . Its body is medium and the carbonate it was hardly 
 noticeable, as it was obvious. It leaves you with a light bitter after 
 taste. The fresh beer from Chios is light, easy to drink and pleasant. 
 Its alcohol content, as stated in the bottle, does not exceed 4.9%abv. 
 Proper serving temperature is 8-12 ° C, as everyone should drink an Ale.
  Ideally is combined with light meals such as salads or vegetable tart.
         </p>
         <p>
          <br/>
         </p>
        </div>
        <p>
         <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir/38.320004257758,26.12689048817/38.321507687838,26.135229474338/" target="_blank">
          <i class="fa fa-map-o">
          </i>
          Directions
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>

      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">

        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Discount to Boat Tickets
        </h2>
        <h5>
         14/06/2018
        </h5>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-new1 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">

            <span style="display: none;">
             New Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/7fd4b653de8671cf06d8999687485b2f_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">

                   </p>

             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-10 p-b-10">
         <div class="p-b-10">
          <p>
           Hellenic Seaways wishing to help boost tourism in the islands of  offers from 15/06/2018 a  on the ferry tickets to the passengers who will choose for their summer holidays the above destinations.
          </p>
          <p>
           and is not valid for the in between routes.
          </p>
          <p>
           For the discount’s validation, it is a prerequisite to present to the cooperating agencies the proof that confirms at least 4 overnight stays to a hotel or rental accommodation to Chios or Mytilene.
          </p>
          <p>
           The proof will be presented and checked by the ship’s competent services during the boarding process, where the name and the number of the overnight stays must be obvious.
          </p>
         </div>
        </div>

        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-new4 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyNewImages638" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/b2e7cb7e3ca237334c4f127b5f834392.jpg" title="chios running">
            <span style="display: none;">
             New Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/b2e7cb7e3ca237334c4f127b5f834392_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>

             <div class="inner full-height">

                <div class="container full-width">

                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-le m-r-10">
                    chios running
                   </p>

        <div class="p-t-10 p-b-10">
         <div class="p-b-10">
          <p>
           <br/>
          </p>
          <h3>
          </h3>
          <p>
           <b>
            7th Halfmarathon in Chios and parallel races10,5 km &amp; 5 km for adults &amp; 1,5 km for children on 26/8/2018! Registration starts !!
           </b>
          </p>
          <p>
           7th Halfmarathon in Chios and parallel races:
           <br/>
           <br/>
           10.5 km
           <br/>
           &amp; 5 km for adults
           <br/>
           &amp; 1,5 km for children
           <br/>
           <br/>
           On 26/8/2018!
           <br/>
           <br/>
           Kampos,  one of the most beautiful areas of Chios, is a unique residential  complex, harmoniously combining the exceptional natural landscape with  particular local architectural features. A place full of citrus fruit  gardens scattered with old mansions, just 6 km south of the city of  Chios. Kampos has been declared a "historical site" and "traditional  settlement", protected by the Ministry of Culture.
           <br/>
           <br/>
           Registrations started !!
           <br/>
           http://www.chiosrunning.gr/en/landing-page/
           <br/>
          </p>
          <p>
           <br/>
          </p>
          <p>
           <br/>
          </p>
          <p>
           <br/>
          </p>
         </div>
         <p>
          <b>
           Tags
          </b>
          : chiosrunning; chios run;
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-labelledby="new_modal411" class="modal fade slide-right" id="new_modal411" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Chios Hiking
        </h2>
        <h5>
         22/01/2018
        </h5>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-new5 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyNewImages411" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/8887d3112e6c26c1bbe53f8944eee5f2.jpg" title="Chios Hiking">
            <span style="display: none;">
             New Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/8887d3112e6c26c1bbe53f8944eee5f2_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-le m-r-10">
                    Chios Hiking
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-10 p-b-10">
         <div class="p-b-10">
          A small group of people, united by our  love for Chios’ old footpaths. They have helped us discover the island’s  astonishing natural beauty. They have also transformed the way we  perceive the history and folklore of this unique island.
          <p>
           We believe that their preservation is  imperative. We follow in the footsteps of our friend Giorgos Chalatsis,  sharing his vision and contributing to his effort for locating old  trails, clearing them out and trying to make them a part of our lives  once again. The best way to accomplish this is by making sure that  locals and tourists will walk on these trails, bringing them back to  life.
          </p>
          <p>
           We have built this webpage to  communicate an image of the experience that awaits you on Chios’  footpaths. Feel free to contact us if you need any information or  assistance regarding hiking on Chios.
          </p>
          <p>
           Visit en.chioshiking.gr for more information
          </p>
          <p>
           <br/>
          </p>
         </div>
         <p>
          <b>
           Tags
          </b>
          : chios hiking
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-labelledby="new_modal372" class="modal fade slide-right" id="new_modal372" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-md" role="document" style="width:100%;max-width:600px;">
      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">
        <button aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         <em aria-hidden="true" class="pg-close fs-18 p-t-10">
         </em>
        </button>
        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Greek Language Courses
        </h2>
        <h5>
         06/01/2018
        </h5>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-new6 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyNewImages372" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/3a1da4983d2da361e34b1d21fc6c955d.jpg" title="Chios language course">
            <span style="display: none;">
             New Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/3a1da4983d2da361e34b1d21fc6c955d_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">
                   <p class="text-white text-left pull-le m-r-10">
                    Chios language course
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-10 p-b-10">
         <div class="p-b-10">
          <p>
           PROGRAM OF COURSES
          </p>
          <p>
           The program will be held in Voulamandis  house in Kampos (Chios) and classes are taking place from Monday to  Friday, from 09:00 to 13:00. The weekend is dedicated to various  cultural activities (optional). It is up to the Alexandria Institute to  make changes in the schedule or the location of the lessons if  necessary. (
           <a href="http://www.alexandria-institute.com)">
            http://www.alexandria-institute.com)
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           Easter program :  01/04/2018 - 14/04/2018
          </p>
          <p>
           September
          </p>
          <p>
           First Period : 02/09/2018- 15/09/2018
          </p>
          <p>
           Second period : 16/09/2018 - 29/09/2018
          </p>
          <p>
           For more details regarding the day to day schedule, the way the courses will be operated, the daily excursions to the island, the cost of the programm and the registration process, please contact directly the Instructor of the courses Alexandria Institute
           <br/>
          </p>
          <p>
           <br/>
          </p>
         </div>
         <p>
          <b>
           Tags
          </b>
          : chios;chios greek language courses;
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>

      <div class="modal-content" style="height:auto !important;min-height:100%">
       <div class="modal-header clearfix text-left">

        <h2 class="text-overflow">
         Apartment Rental - Long Term Rent
        </h2>
        <h5>
         30/08/2017
        </h5>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-body p-t-20">
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="swiper-container swiper-container-new7 swiper-init m-b-30" style="height: 308px;">
         <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          <div class="swiper-slide fit slide1" style="cursor: pointer;">
           <a class="fancybox" data-fancybox-group="fancyNewImages197" href="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/e254f31d7bf7efdfca027012b1782512.jpg" title="Chios rent an apartment">
            <span style="display: none;">
             New Image
            </span>
            <div class="slider-wrapper">
             <div class="image" data-bg-overlay="#333333" data-overlay-opacity="0.3" data-pages-bg-image="https://s3-eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/loggia-cdn/lodgeContent/e254f31d7bf7efdfca027012b1782512_thumb.jpg" data-swiper-parallax="30%">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="content-layer">
             <div class="inner full-height">
              <div class="container-xs-height full-height">
               <div class="col-xs-height col-bottom text-center">
                <div class="container full-width">
                 <div class="row full-width">
                  <div class="col-md-12">

                    Chios rent an apartment
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="p-t-10 p-b-10">
         <div class="p-b-10">
          Voulamandis House Chios has newly renovated family apartments very close to Chios town. Guests that intend to stay in Chios for a longer period (work or pernsion) are welcome to contact us and offer a quote . The rent is per month and includes utility bills. In case you are interested we would be glad to offer you a quote.

   <script type="text/javascript">
    function servicesIncludedClicked()  {
             var myDiv = "<div id='servicesIncludedLoading'><i class='fa fa-spinner fa-pulse fa-3x fa-fw' style='margin-top:40px;margin-left:48%;'></i></div>";
             $(myDiv).css({
                 position: 'absolute',
                 width: '100%',
                 height: '100%',
                 top: 0,
                 left: 0,
                 background: '#fff'
             }).appendTo($('#servicesIncluded').css('position', 'relative'));
 
             setTimeout(function(){$('#servicesIncludedLoading').remove();},1000);
 
         };
 
 
         function servicesOndemandClicked()  {
             var myDiv = "<div id='servicesOndemandLoading'><i class='fa fa-spinner fa-pulse fa-3x fa-fw' style='margin-top:40px;margin-left:48%;'></i></div>";
             $(myDiv).css({
                 position: 'absolute',
                 width: '100%',
                 height: '100%',
                 top: 0,
                 left: 0,
                 background: '#fff'
             }).appendTo($('#servicesOndemand').css('position', 'relative'));
 
             setTimeout(function(){$('#servicesOndemandLoading').remove();},1000);
 
         };
 
 
         function serviceStoreClicked()  {
             var myDiv = "<div id='servicesStoreLoading'><i class='fa fa-spinner fa-pulse fa-3x fa-fw' style='margin-top:40px;margin-left:48%;'></i></div>";
             $(myDiv).css({
                 position: 'absolute',
                 width: '100%',
                 height: '100%',
                 top: 0,
                 left: 0,
                 background: '#fff'
             }).appendTo($('#servicesStore').css('position', 'relative'));
 
             setTimeout(function(){$('#servicesStoreLoading').remove();},1000);
 
         };

             // Add smooth scrolling to all links
             $("a").on('click', function(event) {
                 // Make sure this.hash has a value before overriding default behavior
                 console.log(this.hash);
 
                 if (this.hash !== "" && this.hash !== "#servicesIncluded" && this.hash !== "#servicesOndemand" && this.hash !== "#servicesStore") {
                     // Prevent default anchor click behavior
                     event.preventDefault();
                     // Store hash
                     var hash = this.hash;
                     // Using jQuery's animate() method to add smooth page scroll
                     // The optional number (800) specifies the number of milliseconds it takes to scroll to the specified area
                     $('html, body').animate({
                         scrollTop: $(hash).offset().top-60
                     }, 800, function(){
                         // Add hash (#) to URL when done scrolling (default click behavior)
                         window.location.hash = hash;
                     });
                 } // End if
             });
             window.dispatchEvent(new Event('resize'));
 
             var clusters = [];
 
                         
             pageLatLng = new google.maps.LatLng({lat: 38.321507687838, lng: 26.135229474338});
             var bounds = new google.maps.LatLngBounds();
             var mapOptions = {
                 // How zoomed in you want the map to start at (always required)
                 zoom: 11,
                 disableDefaultUI: false,
                 // The latitude and longitude to center the map (always required)
                 center: pageLatLng,
                 scrollwheel: false,
                 draggable: true
             };
 
             // Get the HTML DOM element that will contain your map
             // We are using a div with id="map" seen below in the <body>
             var mapElement = document.getElementById('lodge-map');
 
             var onclick = "setTimeout(function(){window.dispatchEvent(new Event('resize'));},1000);"
             // Create the Google Map using out element and options defined above
             map = new google.maps.Map(mapElement, mapOptions);

                 '<div id="siteNotice">'+
                 '</div>'+

                 '<div id="bodyContent">'+

             pageLatLng2106 = new google.maps.LatLng({lat: 38.321507687838, lng: 26.135229474338});
             var pageMarker2106 = new google.maps.Marker({
                 position: pageLatLng2106,
                 map: map,
                 //label: 'V',
                 icon: pageMarkerImage
             });
 
 
             pageMarker2106.addListener('click', function() {
                 if (typeof infoWindow != 'undefined')
                     infoWindow.close();
                 infoWindow = new google.maps.InfoWindow({
                     content: pageContentString2106
                 });
                 infoWindow.open(map, pageMarker2106);
             });
 
             bounds.extend(pageMarker2106.position);

             '</div>';
 
             poiLatLng907 = new google.maps.LatLng({lat: 38.341647345485, lng: 26.141881352695});
             var poiMarker907 = new google.maps.Marker({
                 position: poiLatLng907,
                 map: map,
                 //label: '',
                 icon: poiMarkerImage
             });
 
 
 
             poiMarker907.addListener('click', function() {
                 if (typeof infoWindow != 'undefined')
                     infoWindow.close();
                 infoWindow = new google.maps.InfoWindow({
                     content: poiContentString907
                 });
                 infoWindow.open(map, poiMarker907);
             });
             //bounds.extend(poiMarker907.position);
             
 
             clusters.push(poiMarker907);
